thread.section_title: Latest Gigi Hadid News, Pictures and Videos | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: unveiled as British Vogue's March cover star |
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid unveiled as British Vogue's March cover star | Daily Mail Online

author: Lisa Mcloughlin For Mailonline
title: unveiled as British Vogue's March cover star |
text:
She previously landed her first British Vogue cover in January 2016.
Now a year on, Gigi Hadid is breaking new ground as she adds another coveted front spread for the renowned fashion magazine to her arsenal as she appears on the March issue alongside her younger brother Anwar, 17.
The 21-year-old runway star poses with her up-and-coming model sibling in the striking Mario Testino photographed shoot.
Scroll down for video
Family affair: Gigi Hadid is breaking new ground as she adds another coveted front spread for the renowned fashion magazine to her arsenal as she appears on the March issue alongside her younger brother Anwar, 17
Flaunting her striking beauty beside her handsome brother, she slips into a cream silk dress while Anwar wraps his arm around his eldest sister protectively.
Oozing James Dean vibes, the teenager worked a double denim look for the high fashion shoot that will hit the shelves later this week.
Aside from showcasing her model chops in the latest issue, Gigi opens up about her romance with singer Zayn Malik and gives some insight into their connection.
Under the watchful eye of many admirers, the supermodel opened up about her relationship with the former One Direction star, who she has been dating since November 2015.
Quality time: Californian beauty Gigi admitted that when she manages to get time off, she only wants to spend it with her beau drinking coffee and doing art
Both travelling the world as part of their highly successful careers, Californian beauty Gigi admitted that when she manages to get time off, she only wants to spend it with her beau drinking coffee and doing art.
She told the publication: 'When Iâ€™m in LA I mostly stay in because it's my time off and I like being with my boyfriend and doing art and cooking.
'We like late-night movies and we order from this amazing place that does lattes and gingerbread cookies. I need coffee to stay up.
'I'm always like, "Babe, let's go to a movie." Then I fall asleep halfway through and he's like, "You've seen the first half of every movie out there and you have no idea how any of them end."'
Model behaviour: Gigi has become one of the most recognised faces on the catwalk and after earning her wings at Victoria's Secret Paris Fashion Show in November, she came under scrutiny for her noticeably slimmer frame
Gigi has become one of the most recognised faces on the catwalk and after earning her wings at Victoria's Secret Paris Fashion Show in November, she came under scrutiny for her noticeably slimmer frame.
After being on the receiving end of harsh criticism, she revealed she suffers from Hashimoto's disease, a condition that affects the thyroid.
The model revealed at the time that she's getting treatment for hypothyroidism, where the metabolism slows down sometimes causing weight gain and depression, for two years, and says its the medication that's responsible for her newly skinny figure.
Honest: After being on the receiving end of harsh criticism, she revealed she suffers from Hashimoto's disease, a condition that affects the thyroid
In 2015, she also came under fire for her appearance in Tommy Hilfiger's runway show and took to her Instagram to hit back at social media haters in an online rant as she defended her body type following some negative posts.
Speaking about her open-letter, she revealed that she was overwhelmed by the support she received by her peers.
She said: 'The response was crazy. From Victoria's Secret Angels to my friends who are considered plus size, everyone texted me and said they appreciated me saying something.
'The world puts so much pressure on fashion, then judges models for succumbing to that pressure.'
- See the full shoot in the March issue of Vogue, on sale Friday -
Frank: In 2015, she also came under fire for her appearance in Tommy Hilfiger's runway show and took to her Instagram to hit back at social media haters in an online rant as she defended her body type following some negative posts
